ticket.title: Tier2+ sovereignty composition checks in revalidate and consume

tickets.reason: Sovereignty checks consume PCAC join/revalidate/consume contract fields and deny taxonomy.

in_scope: Enforce Tier2+ sovereignty epoch freshness checks in revalidate and consume.
Enforce known principal revocation-head state checks in Tier2+ authority paths.
Enforce autonomy ceiling compatibility and no-active-freeze checks before consume.
Trigger configured freeze action on sovereignty uncertainty where policy requires.
out_of_scope: Principal sovereignty model redesign outside RFC-0027 composition scope.
Tier0/1 policy changes unrelated to Tier2+ contracts.

steps: Wire sovereignty epoch/revocation/autonomy/freeze inputs into Tier2+ revalidate and consume checks.
Implement fail-closed handling for stale, parse-invalid, signature-invalid, and unknown sovereignty states.
Add negative and adversarial tests for stale epoch, unknown revocation head, and freeze-active scenarios.
Capture freeze-action emission evidence for configured uncertainty policies.
Run cargo fmt --all && cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings && cargo test --workspace.

criteria: Tier2+ consume denies on stale/unknown sovereignty authority inputs.
Tier2+ consume denies on principal revocation uncertainty and incompatible autonomy ceiling.
Configured freeze action is emitted on sovereignty uncertainty conditions.

notes.security: Tier2+ uncertainty is containment-critical and must not degrade to permissive behavior.
notes.verification: Include explicit deny/freeze probes for each sovereignty input family.
